name: nlpcloud
description:
NLP Cloud serves high performance pre-trained or custom models for NER, sentiment-analysis, classification, summarization, paraphrasing, text generation, question answering, machine translation, language detection, semantic similarity, tokenization, POS tagging, embeddings, and dependency parsing. It is ready for production, served through a REST API.

This is the Node.js client for the NLP Cloud API.

More details here: https://nlpcloud.io

Documentation: https://docs.nlpcloud.io
author: Julien Salinas
